entry.content: Modern, lightweight HTTP client for JavaScript, with handy tools for working with requests and responses.

entry.title: pranati2507/Flappy_Bird_Game: A lightweight, browser-based Flappy Bird clone crafted using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Guide the bird through a series of pipes by clicking or pressing the spacebar. This project serves as a practical introduction to game development concepts such as animations, collision detection, and responsive design using vanilla web technologies.
entry.content: A lightweight, browser-based Flappy Bird clone crafted using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Guide the bird through a series of pipes by clicking or pressing the spacebar. This project serves as a practical introduction to game development concepts such as animations, collision detection, and responsive design using vanilla web technologies.

entry.title: Yanny24211/pixel-draw: This is a lightweight and interactive pixel drawing board build with Vite (React). The app allows users to create pixel art by clicking across a customizable grid. It's designed for simplicity, speed, and ease of use ‚Äî perfect for quick sketches or experimenting with pixel designs.
entry.content: This is a lightweight and interactive pixel drawing board build with Vite (React). The app allows users to create pixel art by clicking across a customizable grid. It's designed for simplicity, speed, and ease of use ‚Äî perfect for quick sketches or experimenting with pixel designs.

entry.title: SaisumanthT/RSVP-TeamManager: A lightweight, scalable TypeScript service to manage RSVP responses for events on the Gametime Hero platform. Supports adding/updating player RSVP statuses ("Yes", "No", "Maybe"), retrieving confirmed attendees, and counting total, confirmed, and declined responses.
entry.content: A lightweight, scalable TypeScript service to manage RSVP responses for events on the Gametime Hero platform. Supports adding/updating player RSVP statuses ("Yes", "No", "Maybe"), retrieving confirmed attendees, and counting total, confirmed, and declined responses.
